Trevor Flood continues to decline after Auckland hospital’s overdose error causes brain injury https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/trevor-flood-continues-to-decline-after-auckland-hospitals-overdose-error-causes-brain-injury/ZLMEPOV2VFDH3PLTERV6XQHEOM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/trevor-flood-continues-to-decline-after-auckland-hospitals-overdose-error-causes-brain-injury/ZLMEPOV2VFDH3PLTERV6XQHEOM/ Tara ShaskeyTrevor Flood was being treated for cancer when he suffered a significant brain injury.
